name: Snowgiving
description:
HI welcome to SANTA'S FACTORY

your duty as an elf is to try to deliver as many gifts as you can and the catch is

you got to do one gift every 2 minutes without getting caught by the GRINCH

this game was made In ONE WEEK!!

so pls try to report bugs and don't just say bad 

The Creator's youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnCdb2sJ7sB1qWSw7Wkz33w

this game is for the CHRISTMAS SEASON

soooooooooooooo

"MERRY CHRISTMAS"
